name: Aggressive
description: Features at least one character displaying a forceful or hostile attitude.

name: Angry
description: Features at least one character who is acting hostile and visibly angry about the situation.

name: Artistic
description: Features situations or techniques of a particularly artistic or surreal nature.

name: Artistic Lighting
description: Scene shot with particular creative attention to the illumination of performers and scenery.

name: Bizarre
description: Scenes that are strikingly out of the ordinary, such as odd, extravagant, or eccentric.

name: Bored
description: Performer looking bored or disinterested whilst performing a sexual act

name: Boudoir
description: Scenes featuring some combination of intimacy, sensuality, romance, and confidence.

name: Brutal
description: Features action with an exceptional amount of physicality, typically falling under the umbrella of BDSM.

name: Crying
description: Features a character crying during the action.

name: Dirty Talk
description: Features at least one character providing a significant amount of lewd or demeaning dialogue during the action.

name: Disgust
description: Features at least one character who is disgusted by the situation or another performer/viewer.

name: Eager
description: Strong desire or interest in the act to the point of anxiety or impatience.

name: Erotica
description: Scenes that are meant to be relatively inoffensive, often intended for relatively new viewers or for couples to watch together.

name: Giggles
description: Performers giggling or laughing

name: Glamour
description: Features characters and situations of a particularly glamorous, elegant, or luxurious nature.

name: Hardcore
description: Features detailed depictions of sexual organs or sexual acts such as vaginal, anal or oral intercourse.

name: Hard Fuck
description: Features action with a significant amount of speed or force.

name: Horny
description: Character portrayed as strongly sexually aroused.

name: Laughing Humiliation
description: Features a character laughing at someone. Often when seeing them naked.

name: Messy
description: Features performers who are dirty in a literal sense for a significant amount of the action, either naturally or artificially.

name: Nervous
description: Features at least one character who is particularly nervous about the situation.

name: Night
description: Scenes with lighting that highlights they take place at night and/or in the dark.

name: Passion
description: Characters portrayed with a strong physical or emotional attraction to each other.

name: Playful
description: Scenes and characters that are some combination of relaxed, happy, and fun.

name: Relaxed
description: Performer is calm and not anxious or worried.

name: Reluctance
description: Features at least one character who does not want to be involved in the action at first.

name: Romance
description: Scenes featuring some combination of love, sweetness, and emotion.

name: Rough
description: Features action with a significant amount of physicality, often including hair pulling, slapping, and choking.

name: Smiling
description: Performer(s) are predominately or noticably smiling throughout

name: Sneaky
description: Shows at least one character worried about being caught doing something naughty.

name: Softcore
description: Scenes sexualty suggestive or erotic without explicit sex acts.

name: Sultry
description: Features strong, sexually charged glances and exchanges intended to be irresistible to at least one character.

name: Sunlit
description: Scene is lit primarily by natural sunlight.

name: Sweaty
description: Features a significant amount of visible sweat on at least one performer.

name: Touching
description: Capable of arousing emotions of tenderness or compassion.

name: Whispering
description: Performer speaking in a low soft voice in a non-ASMR scene.

name: Wild
description: Sex in a wild and energetic fashion
